#summary Activity is something what creatures do

= Introduction =
Activity defines what [Creature creature] can do. Activity can have argument which is [Article article] but should be [Object an object]
 
= Details =

Types of activities
  * [EatActivity]
  * [RestActivity]
  * ...

= Generalization of activity =

DO SOMETHING WITH ( OBJECT ) 

[Object] can be anything in the [World world].

Examples:
  * eat(bread)
  * rest()
  * sell(soul)
  * buy(love)
